EmailTemplate.name: Oppty moved to 99%
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} Has Been Moved to 99%
EmailTemplate.textOnly: {!Opportunity.Name} has been moved to 99% on {!Opportunity.LastModifiedDate} Link to Opportunity : {!Opportunity.Link} Account: {!Opportunity.Account} Old Sales Stage: (Past Sales Stage Value) New Sales Stage: (New Sales Stage Value) Date Modified: (Date Modified) Modified By: (Modified User's ID) Modified By: (Modified User's Name) has been moved to 99% on (Date Modified)
